attacks.name: Deflector
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, whenever Erika's Exeggcute takes damage, divide that damage in half (rounded down to the nearest 10). (Any other effects still happen.)

attacks.name: Egg Bomb
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing to the Defending Pokémon and Erika's Exeggcute does 20 damage to itself.
